room_title: Escape room "Abandoned School Room" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: Fantastic experience! It was the first time any of us had done an escape room. There were 10 of us doing the Abandoned School Room and it was a lot of fun. It was more challenging than I expected but we did escape with 2 mins to spare. I would highly recommend this as a group activity with friends or colleagues. I will definitely try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned School Room" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: Our group had a great time trying to do the Abandoned School room. The clues were pretty hard but we worked as a team. Hopefully, we will make it next time. We were left with two locks left.

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned School Room" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: Leo was awesome. We did the Chemistry lab room and it was so much fun! Can't wait to go back and complete the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned School Room" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: Highly recommend this place- my daughter and her friends had a blast trying to get out of the old school room. Fun way to celebrate a 12th birthday and the staff was super friendly and helpful!

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned School Room" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: I absolutely loved doing this with my hubby and friends. It was hard but fun and most of all it taught us all that teamwork makes the dream work which in this case was to escape the abandoned school room. I recommend everyone give it a try. #teamlastminute
